1557.name: SPA 67B
1557.Applications: Cement industry, sand winning, mining, agriculture, steel mills etc.
1557.Suitable_For: High-alloyed tubular wire for metal spray on a Cr-B- carbide basis for extreme hard and heat resistant deposits on parts subject to severe mineral abrasion. Applications: Cement industry, pumps, mixer blades, fans, sleeves, mixers, shear blades etc.
